thread.title: United Airlines Pilot Taken Off Flight After Bizarre Rant About Trump, Hillary Clinton, Her Divorce
thread.title_full: United Airlines Pilot Taken Off Flight After Bizarre Rant About Trump, Hillary Clinton, Her Divorce

author: Ken Meyer
title: United Airlines Pilot Taken Off Flight After Bizarre Rant About Trump, Hillary Clinton, Her Divorce
text:
United Airlines Pilot Taken Off Flight After Bizarre Rant About Trump, Hillary Clinton, Her Divorce by Ken Meyer | 6:42 pm, February 12th, 2017 
A United Airlines pilot was relieved of duty on Saturday night after she went on an emotional rant about politics and her personal life over her plane’s intercom. 
United flight 455 was supposed to fly from Austin, TX to San Francisco, CA at approximately 5 p.m., though things took an unexpected turn when the pilot turned up while she was still dressed in her civilian clothes. Passengers on the flight told multiple media outlets that the pilot got on the PA, and she talked about how she was going through a divorce before saying that President Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton are both “assholes.” 
“She started off by saying that she had not voted for either Trump or Clinton because they’re a bunch of liars,” passenger Noel Portugal said to CBS San Francisco . “That’s an odd way to start of the welcome to your flight. It really sort of went downhill from there and didn’t make a lot of sense to any of us.” 
Several passengers got off the plane due to their disturbance from the ranting pilot, who was eventually replaced with another captain. The plane departed two hours behind schedule, and United Airlines issued an apology over the incident. 
“We hold our employees to the highest standards and replaced this pilot with a new one to operate the flight, which we expect will depart shortly. We apologize to our customers for the inconvenience.” 
You can watch part of the rant in the video above, as well as a report on the rest of it, via KPIX. 
[Image via Wikimedia]
